text: Israel competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne, Australia.Israel at the 1956 Melbourne Summer Games ==Results by event== ===Athletics=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !Event !Participant !Result !Ref |- |Men's long jump |David Kushnir |Qualifying - 6.89 metres (place 26) | |- |} ===Diving=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !Event !Participant !Result !Ref |- |Men's 3m springboard |Yoav Raanan |22nd place | |- |} ===Swimming=== Shoshana Ribner {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !Event !Participant !Result !Ref |- |Women's 100 metres freestyle |Shoshana Ribner |First round, - 1:10.4 | |- |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 1956 Summer Olympics 1956 Summer Olympics Summer Olympics
